entry.title: Solving CoinPool high-interactivity issue with cut-through update of Taproot leaves
entry.summary: In this email, Johan discusses the requirement for a merkle root of all participants' keys and balances in order to enforce the creation of new merkle roots according to the coin pool rules when spending it. This means that in order to ensure the correct spending of coins from the pool, the scripts would need to enforce the creation of new merkle roots based on the specified rules.
